pset.five

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • pset.five.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, LamportsMutexAlgorithm

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, LamportsMutexAlgorithm
    Server class. This server assumes all requests will be valid.
